A simple paragraph that can not contain anything that requires fancy layout.
A normal paragraph that can contain lots of stuff. For example
Code examples
The text in a paragraph may continue after the example as well. Here is how to make lists:
List items must contain a container element such as simpara or para (there are plenty of others too, see the DocBook reference for the listitem element.
List items must contain simple paragraphs or paragraphs.
If you plan on making sub-lists, you must use para
first list item second list item
You can also continue an ordered list you just left off
third list item fourth list item
